definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Shang1 ye4 Ji1 qi4

sentences.english: But the commercial media... it's horrible.
sentences.chinese: 但商业传媒就有点糟糕了。

sentences.english: The commercial is part of the government's new campaign against smoking.
sentences.chinese: 商业局是政府反对吸烟运动的一部分。

sentences.english: Two free internet terminals can be found in the Lindner's business corner.
sentences.chinese: 酒店的商业角落提供两个免费上网设备。

sentences.english: The overall level of skilled migration will increase by 5750 program places.
sentences.chinese: 技术和商业移民的总体配额会增加5750个。

sentences.english: Middle and high-end landscape design is required to comply with its commercial orientation.
sentences.chinese: 设计以中高端的景观环境来匹配其商业定位。

sentences.english: II. 199 foreign business invested commercial enterprises need to make rectifications after sorting out.
sentences.chinese: 经过清理需要进行整改的外商投资商业企业199家。

sentences.english: Finally we calculated standard land price of Han Cheng's commercial land in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 最终测算出2002年韩城市城区商业用地基准地价。

sentences.english: Some database features are only available on the commercial editions.
sentences.chinese: 有些数据库特性只在商业版本可用。

sentences.english: At present, China's commercial banks is also difficult to accurately estimate the expected loss of non-lending.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国商业银行还难以准确估算贷款非预期损失。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 东欧各国都为简化商业手续至少采取了一项措施。

sentences.english: Will business leaders succumb to these ideas?
sentences.chinese: 商业领袖们会被这些观点折服吗？

sentences.english: Commercial projects need to be financed in operation period.
sentences.chinese: 运营期融资主要是针对商业房地产项目而成立。

sentences.english: Ad pages have declined even more at Fortune and BusinessWeek.
sentences.chinese: 《财富》和《商业周刊》的广告页数下降更多。

sentences.english: Silent lamb The freshly-made lambs are sold at the commercial area with many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 《沉默的羔羊》在游人众多的商业点，羔羊现杀现卖。

sentences.english: The way to get recovery is to let business alone.
sentences.chinese: 复元的方法是要让商业机构独立。

definition: to retail/to sell individually or in small quantities
